text: Hello ! How can I change the size of the chat icon

Thanks !
You can't, AFAIK
Hi <@U3T21PDBK> this is not working on the RSS feed variable in the HubSpot email template. Is there anything else we can use here?

Hi all, thinking this could be a daft question but I’m going through the CMS course just now and Jeff’s VS Code is highlighting all the HubL code like this but on my VS Code it’s just coming out as white text. It’s not a major issue but if anyone has some tips on how to create that layout, that would be awesome
At the bottom right of VS code
click on HTML
Then
Search :
You have to install the Hubl extension obviously :wink:
All sorted now thanks to <@UBT0AHWLD>
Thanks also for your reply <@U02UG9LCNNA>

All of our free portals are facing this issue, The Subscription tab under the blog section would not open, Which is preventing us from showing the blog subscription form coz the tag `{% blog_subscribe "blog_subscribe" %}`   is not printing anything, Although the exact code is working on another portal on which the subscription tab is showing up in the blog settings section.

I have attached the error and the API response due to which this error is showing up, <@U7SL518D6>, Can we get some help please?
First try cmd+shift+refresh or clear your site specific cookies for HubSpot. (you would need to re-sign in as a result)
Also be aware, you can’t send emails from a CMS Sandbox account, so blog subscription functionality will likely be limited anyways
Thanks for the response, tried clearing cookies and logging back in, did not help, is there anything else I can do?
It may be a limitation related to sandboxes not having access to send emails. Can you send me the portal id, or a link to this page in your account. (You can DM this)

The account type you have is actually not a sandbox account I was wrong. According to a colleage that was reviewing it’s a marketplace account. They have different permissions. The Engineering team is reviewing to see if the permission can be granted to that account type. I’ll let you know what I hear back.
Hi, Does anyone have experience is creating <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/features/memberships/sso|SSO for memberships> on Auth0. Is it supported on Auth0?
I am betting an “Email Address not found in NameID property.” from HubSpot. My Auth0 Saml2 Web app settings look as expected. Does anyone have a suggestion?
Hi, I am beginner to HubSpot.
I am having small POC requirement
Need to create very simple CRUD JS application in my local machine and deploy that in hub spot. On any button click in my JS application i should call specified API end point
Can you please provide recommendations?
